kateacuff.comment: I am concerned that some of these changes may not be what students actually want. But I also don't know what they want. And so I guess my concern is that we may be going down a path of doing things because they seem sensible to adults when maybe kids aren't ready for this kind of thing yet. So while I support many of the elements here, I just don't know whether we've done an adequate job getting student input.

jonnoalcaro.comment: It's hard to give an opinion when we don't know what was actually said by the students.  But based on what was shared this evening, I am inclined to accept the recommendation of the committee.  So my vote is yes.

grahampaige.comment: The meeting minutes show that there was some concern over whether the data used to make this recommendation was accurate. There were also concerns raised by other members about possibly not getting input from students. So based on those two issues, my vote would be to abstain.
